tasks.help: <c>deliver</c> uploads screenshots, metadata and binaries to App Store Connect. Use deliver to submit your app for App Store review.

properties.name: Username
properties.help: Your Apple ID Username.

properties.name: AppIdentifier
properties.help: The bundle identifier of the app to upload or manage testers (optional).

properties.name: AppVersion
properties.help: The version number of the application build to distribute. If the version number is not specified, then the most recent build uploaded to TestFlight will be distributed. If specified, the most recent build for the version number will be distributed.

properties.name: BuildNumber
properties.help: If set the given build number (already uploaded to iTC) will be used instead of the current built one.

properties.name: Platform
properties.help: The platform to use (optional).

properties.name: EditLive
properties.help: Modify live metadata, this option disables ipa upload and screenshot upload.

properties.name: UseLiveVersion
properties.help: Force usage of live version rather than edit version.

properties.name: DevPortalTeamId
properties.help: The short ID of your team in the developer portal, if you're in multiple teams. Different from your iTC team ID!.

properties.name: ItcProvider
properties.help: The provider short name to be used with the iTMSTransporter to identify your team. This value will override the automatically detected provider short name. To get provider short name run pathToXcode.app/Contents/Applications/Application\ Loader.app/Contents/itms/bin/iTMSTransporter -m provider -u 'USERNAME' -p 'PASSWORD' -account_type itunes_connect -v off. The short names of providers should be listed in the second column.

properties.name: BetaAppReviewInfo
properties.help: Beta app review information for contact info and demo account.

properties.name: BetaAppDescription
properties.help: Provide the 'Beta App Description' when uploading a new build.

properties.name: BetaAppFeedbackEmail
properties.help: Provide the beta app email when uploading a new build.

properties.name: LocalizedAppInfo
properties.help: Localized beta app test info for description, feedback email, marketing url, and privacy policy.

properties.name: Changelog
properties.help: Provide the 'What to Test' text when uploading a new build.

properties.name: SkipSubmission
properties.help: Skip the distributing action of pilot and only upload the ipa file.

properties.name: SkipWaitingForBuildProcessing
properties.help: If set to true, the distribute_external option won't work and no build will be distributed to testers. (You might want to use this option if you are using this action on CI and have to pay for 'minutes used' on your CI plan). If set to true and a changelog is provided, it will partially wait for the build to appear on AppStore Connect so the changelog can be set, and skip the remaining processing steps.

properties.name: DistributeExternal
properties.help: Should the build be distributed to external testers? If set to true, use of groups option is required.

properties.name: DistributeOnly
properties.help: Distribute a previously uploaded build (equivalent to the fastlane pilot distribute command).

properties.name: NotifyExternalTesters
properties.help: Should notify external testers? (Not setting a value will use App Store Connect's default which is to notify).

properties.name: Groups
properties.help: Associate tester to one group or more by group name / group id. E.g. -g "Team 1","Team 2" This is required when distribute_external option is set to true or when we want to add a tester to one or more external testing groups.

properties.name: UsesNonExemptEncryption
properties.help: Provide the 'Uses Non-Exempt Encryption' for export compliance. This is used if there is 'ITSAppUsesNonExemptEncryption' is not set in the Info.plist.

properties.name: SkipConfirmation
properties.help: Disables confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

properties.name: RejectBuilderWaitingForReview
properties.help: Expire previous if it's 'waiting for review'.

properties.name: SubmitBetaReview
properties.help: Send the build for a beta review.

properties.name: WaitProcessingInterval
properties.help: Disables confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

properties.name: WaitProcessingTimeoutDuration
properties.help: Timeout duration in seconds to wait for App Store Connect processing. If set, after exceeding timeout duration, this will force stop to wait for App Store Connect processing and exit with exception.

tasks.help: <c>match</c> creates all required certificates & provisioning profiles and stores them in a separate git repository, Google Cloud, or Amazon S3. Every team member with access to the selected storage can use those credentials for code signing. match also automatically repairs broken and expired credentials. It's the easiest way to share signing credentials across teams.

properties.name: AppIdentifier
properties.help: The bundle identifier(s) of your app (comma-separated string or array of strings).

properties.name: Username
properties.help: Your Apple ID Username.

properties.name: Type
properties.help: Define the profile type, can be appstore, adhoc, development, enterprise, developer_id, mac_installer_distribution.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: force	Renew the provisioning profiles every time you run match.

properties.name: IncludeAllCertificates
properties.help: Include all matching certificates in the provisioning profile. Works only for the 'development' provisioning profile type.

properties.name: ForceForNewCertificates
properties.help: Renew the provisioning profiles if the certificate count on the developer portal has changed. Works only for the 'development' provisioning profile type. Requires 'include_all_certificates' option to be 'true'.

properties.name: SafeRemoveCertificates
properties.help: Remove certs from repository during nuke without revoking them on the developer portal.

properties.name: SkipCertificateMatching
properties.help: Set to true if there is no access to Apple developer portal but there are certificates, keys and profiles provided. Only works with match import action.

properties.name: Platform
properties.help: Set the provisioning profile's platform to work with (i.e. ios, tvos, macos, catalyst).

properties.name: Readonly
properties.help: Only fetch existing certificates and profiles, don't generate new ones.

properties.name: SkipDocumentation
properties.help: Skip generation of a README.md for the created git repository.

properties.name: SkipConfirmation
properties.help: Disables confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

properties.name: FailOnNameTaken
properties.help: Should the command fail if it was about to create a duplicate of an existing provisioning profile. It can happen due to issues on Apple Developer Portal, when profile to be recreated was not properly deleted first.

properties.name: DeriveCatalystApplicationIdentifier
properties.help: Enable this if you have the Mac Catalyst capability enabled and your project was created with Xcode 11.3 or earlier. Prepends 'maccatalyst.' to the app identifier for the provisioning profile mapping.

properties.name: IncludeMacInProfiles
properties.help: Include Apple Silicon Mac devices in provisioning profiles for iOS/iPadOS apps.

properties.name: ProfileName
properties.help: A custom name for the provisioning profile. This will replace the default provisioning profile name if specified.

properties.name: TemplateName
properties.help: The name of provisioning profile template. If the developer account has provisioning profile templates (aka: custom entitlements), the template name can be found by inspecting the Entitlements drop-down while creating/editing a provisioning profile (e.g. "Apple Pay Pass Suppression Development").

properties.name: OutputPath
properties.help: Path in which to export certificates, key and profile.

tasks.help: pilot pilot uses spaceship.airforce to interact with App Store Connect.

properties.name: AppVersion
properties.help: The version number of the application build to distribute. If the version number is not specified, then the most recent build uploaded to TestFlight will be distributed. If specified, the most recent build for the version number will be distributed.

properties.name: AppleId
properties.help: The bundle identifier(s) of your app (comma-separated string or array of strings).

properties.name: AppIdentifier
properties.help: The bundle identifier of the app to upload or manage testers (optional).

properties.name: BuildNumber
properties.help: The build number of the application build to distribute. If the build number is not specified, the most recent build is distributed.

properties.name: ExpirePreviousBuilds
properties.help: Should expire previous builds?.

properties.name: DemoAccountRequired
properties.help: Do you need a demo account when Apple does review?.

properties.name: DevPortalTeamId
properties.help: The short ID of your Developer Portal team, if you're in multiple teams. Different from your iTC team ID!.

properties.name: DevPortalTeamName
properties.help: The name of your Developer Portal team if you're in multiple teams.

properties.name: ItcProvider
properties.help: The provider short name to be used with the iTMSTransporter to identify your team. This value will override the automatically detected provider short name. To get provider short name run pathToXcode.app/Contents/Applications/Application\ Loader.app/Contents/itms/bin/iTMSTransporter -m provider -u 'USERNAME' -p 'PASSWORD' -account_type itunes_connect -v off. The short names of providers should be listed in the second column.

properties.name: LocalizedAppInfo
properties.help: Localized beta app test info for description, feedback email, marketing url, and privacy policy.

properties.name: Changelog
properties.help: Provide the 'What to Test' text when uploading a new build.

properties.name: SkipSubmission
properties.help: Skip the distributing action of pilot and only upload the ipa file.

properties.name: SkipWaitingForBuildProcessing
properties.help: If set to true, the distribute_external option won't work and no build will be distributed to testers. (You might want to use this option if you are using this action on CI and have to pay for 'minutes used' on your CI plan). If set to true and a changelog is provided, it will partially wait for the build to appear on AppStore Connect so the changelog can be set, and skip the remaining processing steps.

properties.name: DistributeExternal
properties.help: Should the build be distributed to external testers? If set to true, use of groups option is required.

properties.name: DistributeOnly
properties.help: Distribute a previously uploaded build (equivalent to the fastlane pilot distribute command).

properties.name: NotifyExternalTesters
properties.help: Should notify external testers? (Not setting a value will use App Store Connect's default which is to notify).

properties.name: Groups
properties.help: Associate tester to one group or more by group name / group id. E.g. -g "Team 1","Team 2" This is required when distribute_external option is set to true or when we want to add a tester to one or more external testing groups.

properties.name: UsesNonExemptEncryption
properties.help: Provide the 'Uses Non-Exempt Encryption' for export compliance. This is used if there is 'ITSAppUsesNonExemptEncryption' is not set in the Info.plist.

properties.name: SkipConfirmation
properties.help: Disables confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

properties.name: RejectBuilderWaitingForReview
properties.help: Expire previous if it's 'waiting for review'.

properties.name: SubmitBetaReview
properties.help: Send the build for a beta review.

properties.name: WaitProcessingInterval
properties.help: Disables confirmation prompts during nuke, answering them with yes.

properties.name: WaitProcessingTimeoutDuration
properties.help: Timeout duration in seconds to wait for App Store Connect processing. If set, after exceeding timeout duration, this will force stop to wait for App Store Connect processing and exit with exception.

tasks.help: <c>supply</c> uploads app metadata, screenshots, binaries, and app bundles to Google Play. You can also select tracks for builds and promote builds to production.

properties.name: PackageName
properties.help: The package name of the application to use.

properties.name: VersionName
properties.help: Version name (used when uploading new apks/aabs) - defaults to 'versionName' in build.gradle or AndroidManifest.xml.

properties.name: VersionCode
properties.help: Version code (used when updating rollout or promoting specific versions).

properties.name: ReleaseStatus
properties.help: Release status (used when uploading new apks/aabs) - valid values are completed, draft, halted, inProgress.

properties.name: Track
properties.help: The track of the application to use. The default available tracks are: production, beta, alpha, internal.

properties.name: Rollout
properties.help: The percentage of the user fraction when uploading to the rollout track (setting to 1 will complete the rollout).

properties.name: MetadataPath
properties.help: Path to the directory containing the metadata files.

properties.name: JsonKey
properties.help: The path to a file containing service account JSON, used to authenticate with Google.

properties.name: JsonKeyData
properties.help: The raw service account JSON data used to authenticate with Google.

properties.name: Apk
properties.help: Path to the APK file to upload.

properties.name: ApkPaths
properties.help: An array of paths to APK files to upload.

properties.name: Aab
properties.help: Path to the AAB file to upload.

properties.name: AabPaths
properties.help: An array of paths to AAB files to upload.

properties.name: SkipUploadApk
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading APK.

properties.name: SkipUploadAab
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading AAB.

properties.name: SkipUploadMetadata
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading metadata, changelogs not included.

properties.name: SkipUploadChangelogs
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading changelogs.

properties.name: SkipUploadImages
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading images, screenshots not included.

properties.name: SkipUploadScreenshots
properties.help: Whether to skip uploading SCREENSHOTS.

properties.name: TrackToPromote
properties.help: The track to promote to. The default available tracks are: production, beta, alpha, internal.

properties.name: TrackToPromote
properties.help: Promoted track release status (used when promoting a track) - valid values are completed, draft, halted, inProgress.

properties.name: ValidateOnly
properties.help: Only validate changes with Google Play rather than actually publish.

properties.name: Mapping
properties.help: Path to the mapping file to upload (mapping.txt or native-debug-symbols.zip alike).

properties.name: MappingPaths
properties.help: An array of paths to mapping files to upload (mapping.txt or native-debug-symbols.zip alike).

properties.name: RootUrl
properties.help: Root URL for the Google Play API. The provided URL will be used for API calls in place of https://www.googleapis.com/.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Timeout for read, open, and send (in seconds).

properties.name: VersionCodesToRetain
properties.help: An array of version codes to retain when publishing a new APK.

properties.name: ChangesNotSentForReview
properties.help: Indicates that the changes in this edit will not be reviewed until they are explicitly sent for review from the Google Play Console UI.

properties.name: ChangesNotSentForReview
properties.help: Indicates that the changes in this edit will not be reviewed until they are explicitly sent for review from the Google Play Console UI.

properties.name: InAppUpdatePriority
properties.help: In-app update priority for all the newly added apks in the release. Can take values between [0,5].

properties.name: ObbMainReferencesVersion
properties.help: References version of 'main' expansion file.

properties.name: ObbMainFileSize
properties.help: Size of 'main' expansion file in bytes.

properties.name: ObbPatchReferencesVersion
properties.help: References version of 'patch' expansion file.

properties.name: ObbPatchFileSize
properties.help: Size of 'patch' expansion file in bytes.

properties.name: AckBundleInstallationWarning
properties.help: Must be set to true if the bundle installation may trigger a warning on user devices (e.g can only be downloaded over wifi). Typically this is required for bundles over 150MB.

appstore.name: AppStoreConnectApiKeyPath
appstore.help: Path to your App Store Connect API Key JSON file Using Fastlane Api Key Json file.

appstore.name: AppStoreConnectApiKey
appstore.help: Your App Store Connect API Key information () Using Fastlane Api Key hash option.

fastlane.name: Verbose
fastlane.help: Print out extra information and all commands.

git.name: GitUrl
git.help: URL to the git repo containing all the certificates.

git.name: GitFullName
git.help: git user full name to commit.

git.name: GitShallowClone
git.help: Make a shallow clone of the repository (truncate the history to 1 revision).

git.name: GitCloneBranchDirectly
git.help: Clone just the branch specified, instead of the whole repo. This requires that the branch already exists. Otherwise the command will fail.

git.name: GitBasicAuthorization
git.help: Use a basic authorization header to access the git repo (e.g.: access via HTTPS, GitHub Actions, etc), usually a string in Base64.

git.name: GitBearerAuthorization
git.help: Use a bearer authorization header to access the git repo (e.g.: access to an Azure DevOps repository), usually a string in Base64.

git.name: GitPrivateKey
git.help: Use a private key to access the git repo (e.g.: access to GitHub repository via Deploy keys), usually a id_rsa named file or the contents hereof.

google.name: GoogleCloudBucketName
google.help: Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket to use.

google.name: GoogleCloudKeys
google.help: Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket to use.

google.name: GoogleCloudProjectId
google.help: Name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket to use.

google.name: SkipGoogleCloudAccountConfirmation
google.help: Skips confirming to use the system google account.

ipa.name: Ipa
ipa.help: Path to the ipa file to upload.

s3.name: S3ObjectPrefix
s3.help: Prefix to be used on all objects uploaded to S3.

team.name: TeamId
team.help: The ID of your Developer Portal team if you're in multiple teams.

team.name: TeamName
team.help: The ID of your Developer Portal team if you're in multiple teams.
